question: Provide PMIDs supporting that RB1 Loss-of-function confers resistance to Palbociclib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'RB1 Loss-of-function'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Palbociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Palbociclib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pembrolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pembrolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pembrolizumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 D276G'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Bosutinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bosutinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bosutinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PD173074')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PD173074'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PD173074')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cyproterone Acetate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cyproterone Acetate'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cyproterone Acetate')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FLT3 Y693'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gilteritinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gilteritinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gilteritinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'NRAS G12C'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Chemotherapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Chemotherapy'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Chemotherapy')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
